title: 9-1 in placements, dropped 2 divisions
body:
What's going on with that? I lost 1 game of the 10 I played and went from Gold 2 to Gold 4. Wasn't even my first match that I lost, it was 3 wins in. 

Some cruel trick of fate no doubt, second best placements I've done, and the worst results I've gotten. :I

I was solo queue'd as well, not queue'd as a 5 or even as a 2.

replies.body: I was 5-5 went from plat 2>plat 5. I'm blessed by rito gods. But I think mmr has something to do with it.
better than it was supposed to be, if you were gold 2 you should have been put at silver 2, even if you won 10/10, 80% of other players were dropped a full tier
how many games did you lose leading up to the reset during the preseason?
also oce.op.gg says your mmr may be inaccurate due to too many duo games?
Riot DID state that everyone will be placed slightly lower than they were last season, it's a soft Ranked reset man
